file_content.text: I bow to you, Warleader of the Kaleesh. This army is the Empire's to command.
I am Warleader Gelrex. Who challenges me?
I am Sith, a lord of the Dark Council.
I do.
I am a servant of the Emperor.
I do.
Your titles mean nothing to me.
The toughest fighter you ever met.
I do.
The Empire's most dangerous assassin.
I do.
My name won't do you any good when you're dead.
What does it matter?
What do you want with the people of Kalee?
I'm here to make an offer on behalf of the Empire.
I wanted to talk.
What does the Empire want with the people of Kalee?
You are enemies of the Empire. You must die.
Your deaths. [Attack them]
Then you issue a false challenge. Warriors, to arms.
The Empire wants you to join them, and fight for them.
Your loyalty. [Negotiate]
You have defeated my warriors. You are strong. You have issued the challenge. You are knowledgeable.
But the Republic pays us well and offers us a place among their people.
The Empire are better warriors than the Republic will ever be.
The Empire is stronger.
If it's so, then prove it.
What if I promise your people a place in the Empire? The first aliens since the ancient Sith to join.
We can find peace.
Then I offer my sword and my blaster to you.
Take them as a sign of our sworn allegiance to the Empire.
Let's be clear. It's either this or I kill you.
I'm not asking.
You wish to be warleader of the Kaleesh and force them to join, is that it?
The challenge must be honored.
